sentences.english: They are making further efforts to decrease military spending.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在做進一步的努力來略節略軍費開支。

sentences.english: Parliament voted Charles I &100,000 for the army.
sentences.chinese: 國會曾撥給查理一世10萬鎊作軍費。

sentences.english: We diverted funds from armaments to health and education.
sentences.chinese: 我們把資金從軍費開支轉到衛生和教育事業上來。

sentences.english: We diverted funds from armaments to education.
sentences.chinese: 我們把款項從軍費開支轉爲教育開支。

sentences.english: They also tried to beautify their army (the so call Self Defence Force) increase in military spending.
sentences.chinese: 他們美化他們的軍隊和曾加軍費。

sentences.english: The President is Commander-in-Chief of the army, but Congress appropriates money for a standing army.
sentences.chinese: 總統是軍隊的統帥，但軍費是由國會撥出的。

sentences.english: The Pentagon colossus now accounts for half of total world military spending.
sentences.chinese: 目前五角大樓巨人的開支佔世界總軍費一半。

sentences.english: Militarily, the implementation of Fubing, thereby reducing the pressure in people's heads military spending.
sentences.chinese: 軍事上推行府兵制，減輕了壓在百姓頭上的軍費開支。

definition: Saudi Arabia (Tw), abbr. for 沙烏地阿拉伯王國|沙乌地阿拉伯王国
to raise a loan/to borrow money
